title: 求助！如果用bosssh插件做一个VIP购买商店
author: 魂血.朝月
txt_content: 如题，如何用bossshop插件做一个VIP购买商店，就是花费点卷从普通权限组跳到VIP权限组那样，怎么弄？

replies.author: Imziqi
replies.txt_content:
其实chestcommand更加好用而且比bossshop好修改
http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?m ... light=Chestcommands
这里比较好学
一个简单的物品模版
pawn-item:
    ID: bed
    POSITION-X: 5
    POSITION-Y: 1
    NAME: '&6This is a colored name!'
    LORE:
    - 'Description of the item'
    - 'Some other details'
    - '&cImportant note'
    ENCHANTMENT: 'sharpness, 5; durability, 10; silk touch'
    COLOR: '255, 0, 0'
    SKULL-OWNER: 'filoghost'
    COMMAND: 'spawn'
    PRICE: 100.0
    LEVELS: 5
    POINTS: 50
    REQUIRED-ITEM: 'stained glass:1, 30'
    KEEP-OPEN: true
    PERMISSION: 'my.custom.permission'
    VIEW-PERMISSION: 'my.custom.permission'
    PERMISSION-MESSAGE: '&cYou must be VIP to use this item!

replies.author: ouAuAuo
replies.txt_content:
鄙人的教程
【BossShop】[PCD]全面教程+配合其他插件制作完美菜单
http://mcbbs.tvt.im/thread-690682-1-1.html
(出处: Minecraft(我的世界)中文论坛)

其中实战教程与例子中有讲如何弄VIP
